SELECT xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_id`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_title`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_url`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_method`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_functioninfo_common_mtime`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_status`, xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_content`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_functioninfo_common_ctime`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_functioninfo_common xt_functioninfo_common LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_functioninfo_common.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_functioninfo_common.xt_functioninfo_common_title like '%${xt_functioninfo_common_title}%'
AND xt_functioninfo_common.xt_functioninfo_common_status = #{xt_functioninfo_common_status}

AND xt_functioninfo_common.xt_functioninfo_common_url like '%${xt_functioninfo_common_url}%'
ORDER BY xt_functioninfo_common.`xt_functioninfo_common_ctime` DESC
